Method Detail

build

void build(ComponentType type,
           MapLocation loc,
           RobotLevel level)
           throws GameActionException
Queues an equip action to be beformed at the end of this robot's turn. When the action is executed, the robot at location loc and height level will be equipped with a component of type type. The new component will not be able to perform any actions for GameConstants.WAKE_DELAY rounds.

Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if this component cannot build a component of type type
GameActionException - if this component is already engaged in an action (ALREADY_ACTIVE)
GameActionException - if loc is not adjacent to this robot's location (OUT_OF_RANGE)
GameActionException - if there is no robot at the given location and height (NO_ROBOT_THERE)
GameActionException - if the robot at the given location and height cannot be equipped with the given type of component (WRONG_ROBOT_TYPE)
GameActionException - if there is not enough room in the robot's chassis for the component (NO_ROOM_IN_CHASSIS)
GameActionException - if there not enough resources to build a component of type type (NOT_ENOUGH_RESOURCES)
Cooldown:
type().delay
Bytecode cost:
25

build

void build(Chassis type,
           MapLocation loc)
           throws GameActionException
Queues a spawn action to be performed at the end of this robot's turn. When the action is executed, a new robot will be created at loc. The square must not already be occupied. The new robot is created and starts executing bytecodes immediately, but it will not be able to perform any actions for GameConstants.WAKE_DELAY rounds.

Parameters:
type - the type of chassis to spawn; cannot be null.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if this component cannot build a chassis of type type
GameActionException - if this component is already engaged in an action (ALREADY_ACTIVE)
GameActionException - if loc is not adjacent to this robot's location (OUT_OF_RANGE)
GameActionException - if loc is already occupied (CANT_MOVE_THERE)
GameActionException - if there not enough resources to build a chassis of type type (NOT_ENOUGH_RESOURCES)
Cooldown:
type().delay
Bytecode cost:
25

canBuild

boolean canBuild(Direction dir,
                 RobotLevel level)
